Key Match Events: Luis Severino pitched a dominant seven-inning start sealing a 4-1 Mets victory.
Pre-Game Insights: Not for the first time this season, the Red Sox met, and were bested by, a ghost of offseason past.
The Red Sox had conversations with the longtime Yankees starting pitcher after he became a free agent last offseason.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the third consecutive game in which the Boston bats scored exactly one run.
